Lightning_Bolt.help: The Clockwork can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.targetHelp: The Clockwork can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Tesla_Cage.help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.
Tesla_Cage.targetHelp: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Lightning_Field.help: You have been trapped by Paladin's Lightning Field. You are taking minor damage over time and being drained of endurance.
Lightning_Field.targetHelp: You have been trapped by Paladin's Lightning Field. You are taking minor damage over time and being drained of endurance.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Ball_Lightning.help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.targetHelp: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Mace.help: Paladin has Disoriented you with his massive Mace.
Mace.targetHelp: Paladin has Disoriented you with his massive Mace.
